thread.section_title: fios.verizon.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of fios.verizon.com | fios.verizon.com
thread.title: Victor

author: Victor
title: Victor
text: I am a big researcher and if you do a real comparison (vs Optimum, which oddly seems cheaper due to marketing) Fios is cheaper assuming you do a 2-year commitment. Some people say they dont want the commitment, but be serious, who wants to keep changing cable,phone, internet providers. Also, there representative was smart, fast (but not too fast), helpful, and cheerful. And internet is faster! Lastly, there was a nice sign on bonus which made Fios and even better deal. Thank you
